channel.title: Organizing on Long Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Organizing on Long Thoughts

item.title: Organizing Music
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: I finally found a half-way decent, quick and simple system to organize my music.

item.title: Blogging Setup: Workflow for writing a new blogpost
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: Creating a new blog post using the previously describe setup should be easy and comfortable. These are the generic steps for adding a blog-post.

item.title: Setting up the blog
item.author: felix.brilej@googlemail.com (Felix Brilej)
item.description: Steps: Create a test org-mode file so I don’t destroy everything on accident Create a directory where I want the blog to be, in my case ~/Dropbox/org/blog Follow the steps from here: http://www.holgerschurig.de/en/emacs-blog-from-org-to-hugo/ Install hugo (on Windows 10) Install chocolatey https://chocolatey.org/install#install-with-cmdexe # for the powershell, close it after execution Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://chocolatey.org/install.ps1')) Install hugo using chocolatey: # on the normal shell choco install hugo -confirm Follow the startup steps for hugo to setup a site and get the server running
